import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Box, styled } from '@mui/system' import { Card, Button, Icon } from '@mui/material' import { H1, H5, Paragraph } from 'app/components/Typography' const Container = styled('div')(({ theme }) => ({ margin: '30px', position: 'relative', [theme.breakpoints.down('sm')]: { margin: '16px', }, })) const StyledButton = styled(Button)(() => ({ color: '#08ad6c', overflow: 'hidden', borderRadius: '300px', fontSize: '0.8125rem', padding: '2px 16px', background: 'rgba(9, 182, 109, 0.15)', transition: 'all 250ms', '&:hover': { color: '#ffffff', background: `rgba(9, 182, 109, 1) !important`, fallbacks: [{ color: 'white !important' }], }, })) const StyledTable = styled('table')(({ theme }) => ({ display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', minWidth: 600, '& tbody': { '& tr': { '& td': { paddingTop: '0.75rem', paddingBottom: '0.75rem', textAlign: 'center', color: theme.palette.text.secondary, '& span': { fontSize: 20, color: '#08ad6c' }, '& h5': { color: 'black' }, }, '& .title': { paddingTop: '32px' }, '& td:first-of-type': { textAlign: 'left', }, }, '& tr:first-of-type': { '& h5': { color: 'black' }, '& p, a': { padding: '10px 20px', color: theme.palette.text.secondary, }, '& a': { display: 'block', }, '& button': { paddingLeft: '24px', paddingRight: '24px', marginBottom: '16px', overflow: 'hidden', borderRadius: '300px', }, }, }, })) const Pricing4 = () => { return (

Simple Pricing

{['Essential', 'Premium', 'Enterprise'].map( (item, ind) => (
{item}
All the basics for event & team crowdfunding Learn More ) )}
Pricing
Plan Cost Free Contact Us Contact Us Platform fee 5% 3% Contact Us Payment processing 2.9% 2.4% Contact Us
Features
Unlimited Fundraising campaigns check_circle check_circle check_circle Easy access to funds check_circle check_circle check_circle Mobile Optimized check_circle check_circle check_circle Basic donor data check_circle check_circle check_circle Team fundraising check_circle check_circle check_circle Unlimited Fundraising events check_circle check_circle Comphensive donor data check_circle check_circle ) } export default Pricing4
